original_title: 会社をクビにされた中年オヤジが一年後、社長令嬢を監禁 一週間、真夏のゴミ部屋で汗だく巨漢プレス 高橋しょう子
overview: Takasho gets recognized by an ex-employee of her Father, a dude who has a big grudge against them, and she didn’t fare too well.
title: Middle-Aged Guy who was Fired from a Company Fucks the Company President’s Daughter in a Garbage Room for a Whole Week in Summertime of Sweaty Sex. Shoko Takahashi
